Author: BittyBeau
Text: Know that it won't lead to weight loss. I started having a few drinks before binges so I could easily vomit it back up. I ended up gaining weight bc most of the calories are absorbed before you can puke it up.  It also destroys your body, especially your face, teeth, and heart. The vomit splatters back onto your face and makes you break out in cysts. Don't do it.
